article: the bureau of foreign trade -lrb- boft -rrb- has stepped up export controls on strategic hi-tech commodities from this month in line with international efforts against terrorism and the proliferation of nuclear and biological weapons , boft officials said thursday .
abstract: export controls on strategic hi-tech commodities tightened
